title: Calories in Naan Bread
meta_description: Learn calories in naan bread per piece, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations like garlic naan.
assumptions: Plain naan bread, approximately 100 g per piece, traditionally baked with yogurt and flour; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, flour type, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One piece of naan bread contains about 290 kcal and 50 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Butter naan (extra ghee or butter brushed)
Whole wheat naan (using whole grain flour)

faqs.q: How many calories in one piece of naan bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard 100 g plain naan.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in naan bread?
faqs.a: About 50 g carbs per naan, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Is naan bread high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg sodium per piece due to salt in the dough.

faqs.q: How does garlic naan compare in calories?
faqs.a: Adds about 50 kcal from butter and garlic, totaling ~340 kcal.

faqs.q: Can naan bread be lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for whole wheat versions or bake at home without extra fat to reduce by 20-50 kcal.
